verses.verse: David's <WH1732> Psalm of praise. <WH8416> I will extol <WH7311> thee, my God, <WH430> O king; <WH4428> and I will bless <WH1288> thy name <WH8034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
Every <WH3605> day <WH3117> will I bless <WH1288> thee; and I will praise <WH1984> thy name <WH8034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
Great <WH1419> is the LORD, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised; <WH1984> and his greatness <WH1420> is unsearchable. <WH369> <WH2714>
One generation <WH1755> shall praise <WH7623> thy works <WH4639> to another, <WH1755> and shall declare <WH5046> thy mighty acts. <WH1369>
I will speak <WH7878> of the glorious <WH3519> honor <WH1926> of thy majesty, <WH1935> and of thy wondrous <WH6381> works. <WH1697>
And men shall speak <WH559> of the might <WH5807> of thy terrible acts: <WH3372> and I will declare <WH5608> thy greatness. <WH1420>
They shall abundantly utter <WH5042> the memory <WH2143> of thy great <WH7227> goodness, <WH2898> and shall sing <WH7442> of thy righteousness. <WH6666>
The LORD <WH3068> is gracious, <WH2587> and full of compassion; <WH7349> slow <WH750> to anger, <WH639> and of great <WH1419> mercy. <WH2617>
The LORD <WH3068> is good <WH2896> to all: <WH3605> and his tender mercies <WH7356> are over <WH5921> all <WH3605> his works. <WH4639>
All <WH3605> thy works <WH4639> shall praise <WH3034> thee, O LORD; <WH3068> and thy saints <WH2623> shall bless <WH1288> thee.
They shall speak <WH559> of the glory <WH3519> of thy kingdom, <WH4438> and talk <WH1696> of thy power; <WH1369>
To make known <WH3045> to the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> his mighty acts, <WH1369> and the glorious <WH3519> majesty <WH1926> of his kingdom. <WH4438>
Thy kingdom <WH4438> is an everlasting <WH3605> <WH5769> kingdom, <WH4438> and thy dominion <WH4475> endureth throughout all <WH3605> generations. <WH1755> <WH1755>
The LORD <WH3068> upholdeth <WH5564> all <WH3605> that fall, <WH5307> and raiseth up <WH2210> all <WH3605> those that be bowed down. <WH3721>
The eyes <WH5869> of all <WH3605> wait <WH7663> upon <WH413> thee; and thou <WH859> givest <WH5414> them <WH853> their meat <WH400> in due season. <WH6256>
Thou openest <WH6605> <WH853> thine hand, <WH3027> and satisfiest <WH7646> the desire <WH7522> of every <WH3605> living thing. <WH2416>
The LORD <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662> in all <WH3605> his ways, <WH1870> and holy <WH2623> in all <WH3605> his works. <WH4639>
The LORD <WH3068> is nigh <WH7138> unto all <WH3605> them that call <WH7121> upon him, to all <WH3605> that <WH834> call <WH7121> upon him in truth. <WH571>
He will fulfill <WH6213> the desire <WH7522> of them that fear <WH3373> him: he also will hear <WH8085> their cry, <WH7775> and will save <WH3467> them.
The LORD <WH3068> preserveth <WH8104> <WH853> all <WH3605> them that love <WH157> him: but all <WH3605> the wicked <WH7563> will he destroy. <WH8045>
My mouth <WH6310> shall speak <WH1696> the praise <WH8416> of the LORD: <WH3068> and let all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> bless <WH1288> his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
